title: China fills UNESCO power vacuum as US withdraws funding again
description: Beijing has ramped up efforts to shape UNESCO’s decisions on education, historical sites, and artificial intelligence, stepping in a gap left by the United States.
content:
The United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization (UNESCO), known for designating must-see cultural sites in travel guidebooks, is increasingly influenced by China.
